page.title: 18Our Village
page.content:
Our village is a very pretty village. My Daddy and I went to take the dog for a walk and we saw some beautiful yellow primroses with orange centres, they were all on the hill in the shade of the trees; we named it Primrose Valley. Another evening we went on a walk on a sunny evening. We came to a stream; it was shady there with lots of trees with ivy on them. A little further along I saw a plank that was over the stream so we crossed it then we had an adventure on the other side in the wood.
Sadly since Martha wrote this piece of writing her Daddy has tragically died but she wanted it to be included as a memory of the walks they had together in between his busy life as a farmer.
